summary: Interactive romantic Valentine web page for Shivani with animated neon heart wallpaper, two-choice interaction where the negative option evades clicks, and a meme reveal on acceptance; built with HTML/CSS/JS to run in iPad Chrome.
architectural_notes: Use plain HTML/CSS/JS (no build step) for easy running in Chrome on iPad.
Implement animated heart wallpaper via CSS/Canvas + JS for interactive floating hearts.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page romantic experience that asks: "Shivani,\nWill you be my Valentine?" and presents exactly two choices labeled "yess" and "i dont like you".

Implement a live animated full-viewport background of many small neon hollow outlined hearts that continuously float upward from the bottom of the viewport to the top, using a pink-and-white neon palette.

Make the animated hearts background interactive so user input (mouse move on desktop and touch on iPad) visibly affects nearby hearts (e.g., gentle repulsion/drift/glow change) while keeping the upward floating motion.
